DOC.brief_title: Pilot Trial Peer Support Bipolar Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Bipolar disorder chronic often disable illness affect 1-2 % US adult . Peer support program innovative promise model reverse demoralization , activate consumer seek effective care , develop consumer ' self-management skill , restore participation work social role . Peer-led program address key barrier dissemination effective psychosocial treatment . This pilot effectiveness trial evaluate feasibility , acceptability , effectiveness structure peer support program base Certified Peer Specialist Program Depression Bipolar Support Alliance ( DBSA ) . Following philosophy recovery , intervention focus : - Motivating consumer develop expectation recovery - Encouraging regular self-monitoring mood symptom - Training consumer develop self-management skill symptom control problem solve - Activating consumer inform partner care effective self-advocates - Motivating assist consumer reclaim work reward social role The investigator use rigorous research design evaluate structure peer support promotes core value mental health recovery . Impact intervention judge across range outcome : - Long-term control mood disorder symptom - Optimal participation work reward social role - Consumers ' perception autonomy full participation treatment process Findings pilot study inform development full-scale effectiveness trial include broad range participant health care setting .
